title: 是否另类辱包，模玩厂？
contents:
Does China have a New “Emperor”?
http://www.galleryhistoricalfigures.com/figuredetail.php?abvrname=Xi_Jenping
 Xi’s career was a gradual, unspectacular rise through the ranks of the Communist Party, beginning in the 1970s. His voice was added to other leaders in the actions taken to quell the 1989 uprising. He is seen as a perfect fit for China’s current position as, arguably, the most powerful nation in the 21st century.
这个模玩厂做的比较写实。目前有不少中国元素和人物，包括毛泽东蒋介石。看来习近平也被盯上了，哈哈。毛泽东被归类为Really Awful People
